text: Na waxatini, Yesu fɔxɔrabirane to yi wuyama ayi, Yahudiyan naxanye yi Girɛki xuiin falama, ne yi e mawuga Yahudiyan bonne fari naxanye yi Heburu xuiin falama bayo e kaɲa gilɛne mi yi lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ balon sɔtɔma a kiini a taxun waxatini. Yahudiya Girɛki xui falane naxa, “Gbetin naxan yitaxunma lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ balon na, nxɔ kaɲa gilɛne mi na se sɔtɔma.”
